snippet.title: Just Cause 4 - Editions Explained
snippet.description:
As some of you may have heard, we recently upgraded our Just Cause 4 offering to include additional deluxe gear, providing this explosive content to new players as standard in the Reloaded Edition.

As well as that, there's also the Gold and Complete editions packing in a whole host of stuff too. This video breaks down everything you’ll receive in these different versions of #JustCause4.

Reloaded Edition: 0:25
Gold Edition: 0:57
Complete Edition: 2:00

Just Cause 4 is available NOW on Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC (Steam). Buy here: https://justcause.square-enix-games.com/en-us/buy-now

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for further updates on Just Cause 4: http://sqex.link/JCSubscribe
